content:
Of course! Here's a shorter version:

Roses are red, violets are blue,
Springtime's here, bringing colors anew.
Pink, yellow blooms, morning dew,
Nature wakes, bidding winter adieu.

Bees and butterflies dance and play,
Beneath the sun's warm, gentle ray.
Flowers burst forth in full bloom,
Sweet perfume fills every room.

Let's celebrate this season's cheer,
New beginnings, love, and joy near.
Spring has come, with endless grace,
Bringing happiness to every place.
